title: Spaced Learning-Based Advanced Mathematics Concept Acquisition Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic mathematics concepts (functions, calculus) and professional work experience
context.additional_context: Intensive design utilizing smartphone-based learning modules and review notification systems, including peer coaching sessions among learners

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to solve linear algebra problems by applying a spaced learning strategy with 85% or higher accuracy
Learners acquire the ability to effectively analyze complex mathematical problems through a three-stage cognitive restructuring process
Learners autonomously perform weekly review routines with a participation rate of 70% or higher in a mobile environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
